page.title: 12ASDA
page.content: On the 22nd of May 1985 the top class from St.Paul's Primary School visited Asda Superstore to interview the general manager,Mr.Morgan.Asda stands for Associated Dairies which is the largest superstore chain in the United Kingdom with over a hundred stores nation-wide. The store was opened in 1970 on the site of an old mill.It covers an area of 8,000sq.m.,5000sq.m. of which is selling area.There are parking spaces for 383 cars.At the present time there are 185 people employed,90% of which are female.The total wage bill for these people comes to Â£1million. During an average week 28,000 pass through Asda's doors spending in excess of Â£50,000.There are 26 cash tills to cut down the queues.150 deliveries are needed per week to keep Asda's storerooms fully stocked
